TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPermission implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 定义由权限类型实现的方法。

span.span: Defines methods implemented by permission types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的权限是描述的操作可以受保护的指定资源组的对象。Permissions in the common language runtime are objects that describe sets of operations that can be secured for specified resources. 权限对象描述的操作或受到安全控件，则访问它不表示访问或执行操作的权限。A permission object describes operations or access that is subject to security control; it does not represent access or a right to perform operations. 权限将由应用程序代码和.NET Framework 安全系统使用以下方式。Permissions are used by both application code and the .NET Framework security system in the following ways. - 代码请求运行所需的权限。Code requests the permissions it needs in order to run. - 安全系统策略授予权限以使其运行的代码。The security system policy grants permissions to code in order for it to run. - 代码调用方请求程序调用的代码拥有的权限。Code demands that calling code has a permission. - 代码将重写安全堆栈使用 assert/拒绝/只可允许的。Code overrides the security stack using assert/deny/permit-only. > [!NOTE] > 如果要编写新的权限，您必须在类中实现此接口。If you write a new permission, you must implement this interface in your class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 可以通过多个线程访问权限。A permission can be accessed by multiple threads. 在实现此接口，您必须保证， ， ，和是线程安全的方法实现。When implementing this interface, you must guarantee that the , , , and method implementations are thread safe. ## Examples 此示例演示如何定义使用权限类使用代码访问安全性。This example shows how to define a permission class for use with code access security. 实现了所有必需的权限接口。All of the necessary permission interfaces are implemented. [!code-cpp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Permission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed

summary.span: 如果不满足安全要求，则会在运行时引发 。

span.span: Throws a at run time if the security requirement is not met.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全库通常使用此方法以确保调用方有权访问的资源。This method is typically used by secure libraries to ensure that callers have permission to access a resource. 例如，安全类库中的文件类调用为必需之前执行由调用方请求的文件操作。For example, a file class in a secure class library calls for the necessary before performing a file operation requested by the caller. 尽管大部分实现此接口方法的类满足安全条件通过执行完整的堆栈审核，但不一定被执行堆栈审核。Although the majority of the classes that implement this interface method satisfy the security criteria by performing a full stack walk, a stack walk is not necessarily performed. 实现不执行堆栈遍历的一个示例是。An example of an implementation that does not perform a stack walk is . 执行堆栈遍历时，不会检查调用此方法的代码的权限;检查开始从该代码的直接调用方，并且在堆栈中向上继续进行。When a stack walk is performed, the permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此的调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 仅当没有引发。 succeeds only if no is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 以下语句所需的所有实现均为 true方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X` 并`Y`代表不是对象引用`null`。`X` and `Y` represent object references that are not `null`. - `X`.Intersect (`X`) 返回一个值等于`X`。`X`.Intersect(`X`) returns a value equal to `X`. - `X`.Intersect (`Y`) 返回相同的值`Y`。Intersect (`X`)。`X`.Intersect(`Y`) returns the same value as `Y`.Intersect(`X`). - `X`.Intersect (`null`) 返回`null`。`X`.Intersect(`null`) returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Permission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#2)]

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且不是与当前权限属于相同类的实例。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 以下语句所需的所有实现均为 true方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X``Y`，并`Z`表示不是对象`null`。`X`, `Y`, and `Z` represent objects that are not `null`. - `X`.IsSubsetOf (`X`) 返回`true`。`X`.IsSubsetOf(`X`) returns `true`. - `X`.IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 返回相同的值`Y`。IsSubsetOf (`X`) 当且仅当`X`和`Y`表示相同的权限集。`X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) returns the same value as `Y`.IsSubsetOf(`X`) if and only if `X` and `Y` represent the same set of permissions. - 如果`X`。IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 和`Y`。IsSubsetOf (`Z`) 都返回`true`， `X`。IsSubsetOf (`Z`) 返回`true`。If `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) and `Y`.IsSubsetOf(`Z`) both return `true`, `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Z`) returns `true`. 如果`X`表示空对象的权限状态并`Y`表示对象，该对象`null`， `X`。IsSubsetOf (`Y`) 返回`true`。If `X` represents an empty object with a permission state of and `Y` represents an object that is `null`, `X`.IsSubsetOf(`Y`) returns `true`. 如果`Z`也是空的权限，复合设置操作`X`。Union(Z)。IsSubsetOf(Y) 也会返回`true`因为两个空权限的联合是空的权限。If `Z` is also an empty permission, the compound set operation `X`.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the union of two empty permissions is an empty permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Permission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 以下语句所需的所有实现均为 true方法。The following statements are required to be true for all implementations of the method. `X` 并`Y`代表不是对象`null`。`X` and `Y` represent objects that are not `null`. - `X`.Union (`X`) 返回具有相同的值的对象`X`。`X`.Union(`X`) returns an object that has the same value as `X`. - `X`.Union (`Y`) 返回具有相同的值返回的对象的对象`Y`。Union (`X`)。`X`.Union(`Y`) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by `Y`.Union(`X`). - `X`.Union (`null`) 返回具有相同的值的对象`X`。`X`.Union(`null`) returns an object that has the same value as `X`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Permission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#5)] -
